title: The 'Big Lie' - 2020 Election Fraud Claims
summary: Trump's false claims about the 2020 election led to 60+ failed lawsuits, culminated in the January 6 Capitol attack, and represent what historians call implementation of Hitler's 'big lie' propaganda technique.
keyFacts: Filed 60+ lawsuits challenging election results; 61 of 62 failed in court
His own Attorney General William Barr: 'The Department of Justice found no evidence of fraud'
AP found fewer than 475 potential fraud cases out of 25+ million votes - not enough to change any result
Republican officials, election officials, and judges all rejected fraud claims
Directly led to January 6, 2021 Capitol attack that killed 5 and injured 140+ police officers
CREW found Trump spread election conspiracy theories 526 times on Truth Social (Jan 2023-April 2024)
Still repeats lie in 2025: Called 2020 'a fake election' at December 2025 Cabinet meeting

sources.text: CREW: Donald Trump has spread 2020 election conspiracy theories 500 times on Truth Social
